name: Pongsanity
description:
Bringing the arcade "PONG" game into single-player. Enjoy this simple and minimalistic single-player game made to keep you company when you want to pass some time! 

How To Install & Play - 

1. Download the .zip file and extract it 

2. Go to the builds folder -> Pongsanity folder -> Windows folder -> Installer folder -> click on Pongsanity Setup (x86)

3. Let the installer run and play.
